column4: the script has some flaws, especially with quoting of variables and parsing the contents of ls -- if you want to fix them, /join #bash and use !pitfalls
thanks. This is a first cut, I know it's probably buggy, plus it should be tweaked for one's own environment. I'll join the channel
make sure you don't have any leading spaces before /join  -- and your irc client might have opened the channel in a separate tab or in the background
